name: olive zombie invasion
description:
a nuclear power plant exploded and turned olives into zombies, luckily you were in the bathroom and nothing happened to you, now you need to kill the zombies and stay alive (watch out for the superior extinct zombie, when you win wait a few seconds).    

1 make dowload          2 extract the files         3 open file          

 4 locate the app (invasão de zumbi)           5   click in the app
